thread.title: Trump’s budget proposal has critics crying bloody murder
thread.title_full: Trump’s budget proposal has critics crying bloody murder

author: RT
title: Trump’s budget proposal has critics crying bloody murder
text:
Trump’s budget proposal has critics crying bloody murder  31 Get short URL © Kevin Lamarque / Reuters Twitter exploded in outrage when people heard about President Donald Trump’s proposed budget. Many criticized slashing small agencies and programs like Meals on Wheels, the National Endowment for the Arts, NPR, PBS, and more. 
If approved, Trump’s “America First” budget would eliminate the Meals on Wheels program that delivers food to millions of seniors. That prompted the hashtag #LetThemDie to trend on Twitter.
